original_text: Moses did what the Lord said. Moses and the priests and all the people came to the door of the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 하매 회중이 회막 문에 모인지라

sentences.original_text: Moses did what the Lord said
Moses and the priests and all the people
came to the door of the Tent of Meeting
